EmailTemplate.name: Ignite - Warks 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite - Solihull, Coventry & Warwickshire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ignite: Get Inspired, Reunite & Spark your Future!
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Didn't manage to get a ticket last time...... Now is your chance!
Due to the high demand of ticket sales we have released the final batch of tickets.
This is your last chance to reserve a place at the event.
Saturday 28th November 2.00 - 6.00pm Toute Suite, NEC, Birmingham, B40 1NT
HOW TO GET TICKETS:
You can only secure a maximum of 1 ticket per NCS Graduate. There are limited tickets available - on a first come first serve basis so get in there quick!
Say YES to IGNITE and click on this link to get your FREE ticket:
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-2015-solihull-coventry-and-warwickshire-tickets-19493368189
If you have questions about Ignite, contact: emily.booth@the-challenge.org
